greeting: Hi there! How can I make your day easier?
Hello! I'm here if you need anything.
Hi! Always nice to chat with you. What can I help with?
farewell: Take care! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything.
Bye for now! Looking forward to our next chat.
See you soon! I'm here whenever you need me.
Have a great rest of your day! Come back anytime.
gratitude: Happy to help! That's what I'm here for.
Glad I could make things easier for you!
You're very welcome! Always a pleasure.
No problem at all! Let me know if you need anything else.
confusion: Let me try explaining that differently - {previous_response}
I get why that might not be clear. Here's another way to look at it: {previous_response}
Let me break that down a bit more simply: {previous_response}
Maybe I can explain it better this way: {previous_response}
help_request: Sure thing! What kind of help do you need?
I'd love to help out. What's going on?
Of course! Tell me what you're trying to do.
I'm all ears! What can I help you with?
object_inquiry: From what I can see, there's {visual_objects}. Want to know more about any of them?
I can spot {visual_objects} right now. What would you like to know?
I see {visual_objects}. Which one are you curious about?
There's {visual_objects} in view. Feel free to ask about any of them.
emotional_support: I understand how you feel. Want to talk more about it?
That sounds really challenging. I'm here to listen and help if I can.
It's completely normal to feel that way. Let's work through this together.
I hear you, and your feelings are valid. How can I support you?
social_chat: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How's your day going?
Pretty good! Always nice to chat with you. What's new?
Can't complain! How are you doing today?
All good here! How has your day been so far?
opinion_request: From what I understand, {analysis_result}. What do you think about that?
Based on what I know, {analysis_result}. Curious to hear your thoughts!
Well, {analysis_result}. Does that match your perspective?
I'd say {analysis_result}, but I'd love to hear your take on it.
clarification_request: Sure, let me explain that better.
Happy to clarify! Here's what I mean...
Of course! Let me break that down for you.
Let me make that clearer for you.
unknown: I'm not quite sure I follow. Could you explain that differently?
I want to help, but I'm a bit unsure what you mean. Mind elaborating?
Could you rephrase that? I want to make sure I understand correctly.
I'm drawing a blank here. Could you tell me more about what you need?
clarification: To help you better, could you tell me a bit more about that?
Mind sharing a few more details? That would help me give you a better response.
I want to make sure I understand completely. Could you elaborate?
Just so I'm on the right track - could you explain that further?
error_acknowledgment: Oops, that didn't quite work as planned. Let's try a different approach.
Sorry about that! Let me try something else.
That didn't go as expected. Mind if we try another way?
My mistake! Let's see if we can tackle this differently.
thinking: Let me think about that for a moment...
Hmm, give me a second to process that...
One moment while I consider that...
success: Great! That's all set for you.
Done! Let me know if you need anything else.
All set! Was there anything else you wanted to do?
confirmation_request: Just to make sure - would you like me to {action}?
Before I do that, can I confirm that you want to {action}?
Would you like me to {action} now?
